subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Do you get VERY tired from your sessions?
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I usually feel pretty tired at the end of those 36 and 48 hour ham radio 
contests, but very rarely does something drain me after 10 minutes.

I know people have experienced ghosts robbing the energy from their 
batteries, etc. particularly when an area seems very active.  I wonder in 
this case if whoever or whatever is producing the sounds in the boxes can 
actually get some of your body's energy to use?

Zack (W9SZ)

On Thu, 28 Feb 2008, dead.science wrote:

> I get very very tired from my sessions. I try to keep them to 10 min.
> because of this.  Please remember I run marathons and have been a ham
> for over 20 years so I can listen to the radio for hours on end.  I am
> not certain why this is happening. Just wondering if anybody has this
> problem.
> Rob.
>
